name: The beauty of simplicity
description:
I love Saigon although it’s small, too small for me to embrace it in my heart. I not only love the bustle or hustle in the morning, nor only love its beauty at night. It can simply be having a family’s meal, chatting with all members, sharing the experiences in life, or sometimes it’s the figures of Ao Dai in the winds in the air. I love its simplicity. During the short time together, I will show you:

- One Pillar Pagoda
- Ao Dai Museum
- How to make traditional cake

Come and see!!!
